name: Ack! Zombies!
description:
Save the survivors crops by protecting the settlement from zombie attacks.

Click on the ammunition pile to deliver ammunition to the guards or click on the scrap metal pile to be able to repair holes in the fences as they take damage.

Survive for as long as possible.

CONTROLS:

A & D to rotate the camera

W & S to zoom in and out

Left click to move, pick up ammo, pick up scraps, drop off ammo and repair fences.
